Name: RollingBall
About the game: RollingBall is a physical simulation rolling ball game. The idea was from Hamster Ball. You will control the rolling ball to move to the destination across platforms. You can move with WASD, jump with spacebar, hook with left click, super jump with right click, use items with Q,and more and more....
